name: Mikaela
description: '''Micaela Rodríguez Cuesta''' (19 June 1935 – 29 March 1991), known professionally as '''Mikaela''', was a Spanish singer and actress. She began her film career in 1956 and played her first starring role in the Spanish film ''[[The Red Rose (1960 film)|The Red Rose]]'' (1960). Her [[signature song]], "La luna y el toro" (1964), was a number-one hit in Spain and earned her an award in 1965. She died on 29 March 1991 from [[leucemia]].
